data.title: A fund raiser for Oldenburg Academy, with all proceeds going directly to our OA Tuition Assistance
data.meta_description: A fund raiser for Oldenburg Academy, with all proceeds going directly to our OA Tuition Assistance - Twice Blessed Resale
data.text:
We are a donation based, not for profit thrift store owned by Oldenburg Academy and located in the Batesville Shopping Village. Your donations and your patronage help us to work with many local churches and organizations such as Safe Passage and So Loved Foster Closet. In addition all profits go to help Oldenburg Academy students with tuition assistance and continue the Quality Education the Sisters of St. Francis started over 160 years ago. Thank you for all your support.

DONATION HOURS

MONDAY-FRIDAY 9AM-5PM

SATURDAY 9AM-1PM

Donations closed the final week of each month.

PLEASE CHECK TOP OF THIS PAGE OR CALL TO BE SURE THE DONATION CENTER IS OPEN.

We accept gently used clothes, shoes, toys, books, linens, and house wares. We do accept some furniture but please call ahead to be sure we have the space to display it 812-932-1414. All clothing donations are hand steamed!!!

EFFECTIVE IMMEDIATELY:DUE TO CHANGING LOCAL RECYCLING POLICIES WE DO NOT ACCEPT ANY OF THE FOLLOWING ELECTRONIC ITEMS:

TV'S

MONITORS

PRINTERS AND FAX MACHINES

DVD AND VCR PLAYERS

PHONES AND ANSWERING MACHINES

We are also legally not allowed to accept the following:

Baby cribs

Strollers

Mattresses

Car Seats

Many baby related equipment like swings, bouncy chairs, etc.

We are sorry but we are unable to accept these items regardless of condition. If you have questions, please call ahead 812-932-1414. THANK YOU SO MUCH FOR UNDERSTANDING!

RETURNS ARE ACCEPTED WITH IN 7 DAYS ON CLOTHES ONLY.TAGS MUST BE ATTACHED & YOU MUST HAVE THE RECIEPT TO RECIEVE A STORE CREDIT ONLY, NO CASH RETURNS WILL BE MADE.

MANAGERS MEMO

Stop in and see what treasures we have for you today.

Be Twice Blessed,

Tonya
